gurmukhi: pwie lwg lwg dUqI bynqI krq hqI mwn mqI hoie kwhY muK n lgwvqI
transliteration: Paai Laag Laag Dootee Baynatee Karat Hatee , Maan Matee Hoi Kaahai Moukh N Lagaavatee ?
translation: When the maid-servant bringing the message of my dear husband used to fall on my feet and pray, I in my arrogance would not even look at or even speak with her.

gurmukhi: sjnI skl kih mDur bcn inq sIK dyiq huqI pRiq auqr nswvqI
transliteration: Sajanee Sakal Kahi Madhur Bachan Nita , Seekh Dayti Houtee Prati Outar Nasaavatee ?
translation: My friends used to ever advise me with sweet words but , I used to reply them haughtily and send them away.

gurmukhi: Awpn mnwie piRAw tyrq hY piRAw piRAw sun sun mon gih nwXk khwvqI
transliteration: Aapan Manaai Priaa Tayrat Hai Priaa Priaa , Soun Soun Mon Gahi Naayak Kahaavatee ?
translation: Then, when the beloved Lord himself used to come and call me-O darling! 0 dear one! I used to keep silent just to feel important.

gurmukhi: ibrh ibCoh lg pUCq n bwq koaU biRQw n sunq TwFI d√çwir ibllwvqI ]575]
transliteration: Birah Bichhoh Lag Poochhat N Baat Kooo , Bridaa N Sounat Tthaaddhee Dvaari Bilalaavatee ?575?
translation: And now when I am suffering the pangs of separation of my husband, no one even come to ask me what state I am living in. Standing on my beloved's door I am crying and wailing.  (575)
